languages.text: "Крематорий слегка раздолбали, хе-хе. Но к чему нам крематорий? Денз любил, когда враги облиты {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометием{/g} и горят — не зря его звали Дензом Канистрой! Будет красиво отправить его в последний путь тем же способом. Благо, канистру прометия на Футфоле достать проще простого".

"The crematorium is a bit wrecked now, heh heh. But who needs a crematorium? Denz loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned — they didn't call him Jerrycan Denz for nothing! I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Крематорий слегка раздолбали, хе-хе. Но к чему нам крематорий? Благо, канистру прометия на Футфоле достать проще простого".

languages.text: “火葬场已经搞得有点破破烂烂了，呵呵，不过谁要去什么火葬场呢？丹兹活着的时候，喜欢把他的敌人泡在{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}里烧死，那些人叫他‘油罐’丹兹不是没道理的！我认为，如果能以同样的方式送他上路，应该算是不错的致敬。好消息是，落脚港这种地方很容易就能买到钷素。”
languages.original_text: "The crematorium is a bit wrecked now, heh heh. But who needs a crematorium? Denz loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned — they didn't call him Jerrycan Denz for nothing! I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."

languages.text: «El crematorio está hecho polvo, je. Pero ¿quién necesita un crematorio? A Denz le encantaba cubrir a sus enemigos de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} y quemarlos, ¡por algo le llamaban Denz Bidones! Creo que sería un bonito gesto despedirle de la misma forma. Por suerte, conseguir un bidón de prometio en Paso es bien fácil».
languages.original_text: "The crematorium is a bit wrecked now, heh heh. But who needs a crematorium? Denz loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned — they didn't call him Jerrycan Denz for nothing! I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: «El crematorio está hecho polvo, je. Pero ¿quién necesita un crematorio? A Denz le encantaba cubrir a sus enemigos de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} y quemarlos, ¡por algo le llamaban Denz Bidones! Creo que sería un bonito gesto despedirle de la misma forma. Por suerte, conseguir un bidón de prometio en Paso es bien fácil».

languages.text: 「火葬場が酷い有様になってしまいましたね…ふふ。でも、そんなものは必要ない。デンツは敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}に浸して燃やすのが大好きでした。『ジェリカン・デンツ』と呼ばれたのもそのためです！彼も同じように葬ってあげるのが最後の心遣いというものでしょう。幸いにもフットフォールではジェリカン一杯のプロメチウムが簡単に手に入ります」
languages.original_text: "The crematorium is a bit wrecked now, heh heh. But who needs a crematorium? Denz loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned — they didn't call him Jerrycan Denz for nothing! I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: 「火葬場が酷い有様になってしまいましたね…ふふ。でも、そんなものは必要ない。デンツは敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}に浸して燃やすのが大好きでした。『ジェリカン・デンツ』と呼ばれたのもそのためです！彼も同じように葬ってあげるのが最後の心遣いというものでしょう。幸いにもフットフォールではジェリカン一杯のプロメチウムが簡単に手に入ります」

languages.text: "Das Krematorium ist aktuell in keinem guten Zustand, he he. Aber wer braucht schon ein Krematorium? Denz hat seine Feinde immer gerne mit {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} übergossen und dann angezündet – schließlich hieß er nicht umsonst Kanister Denz. Ich hielte es für eine schöne Geste, wenn wir ihn genauso auf seinen letzten Weg schicken würden. Zum Glück ist es kein Problem, auf Footfall einen Kanister mit Promethium zu organisieren."
languages.original_text: "The crematorium is a bit wrecked now, heh heh. But who needs a crematorium? Denz loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned — they didn't call him Jerrycan Denz for nothing! I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Das Krematorium ist aktuell in keinem guten Zustand, he he. Aber wer braucht schon ein Krematorium? Denz hat seine Feinde immer gerne mit {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} übergossen und dann angezündet – schließlich hieß er nicht umsonst Kanister Denz. Ich hielte es für eine schöne Geste, wenn wir ihn genauso auf seinen letzten Weg schicken würden. Zum Glück ist es kein Problem, auf Footfall einen Kanister mit Promethium zu organisieren."

languages.text: « Le crématorium est passablement hors d'usage, hé hé. Mais qui a besoin d'un crématorium ? Denz prenait plaisir à arroser ses ennemis de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g} et à leur mettre le feu. Après tout, ce n'est pas pour rien qu'on l'appelait Jerrycan Denz ! Ce serait lui rendre hommage que de l'incinérer de la même manière, surtout qu'il n'est pas bien difficile de se procurer un jerrycan de prométhium à Castel. »
languages.original_text: "The crematorium is a bit wrecked now, heh heh. But who needs a crematorium? Denz loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned — they didn't call him Jerrycan Denz for nothing! I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: « Le crématorium est passablement hors d'usage, hé hé. Mais qui a besoin d'un crématorium  ? Denz prenait plaisir à arroser ses ennemis de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g} et à leur mettre le feu. Après tout, ce n'est pas pour rien qu'on l'appelait Jerrycan Denz ! Ce serait lui rendre hommage que de l'incinérer de la même manière, surtout qu'il n'est pas bien difficile de se procurer un jerrycan de prométhium à Castel. »

languages.text: "Krematoryum şu an biraz harap durumda, he he. Fakat krematoryumu kim ne yapsın? Denz, düşmanlarını {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometyuma{/g} bulayıp yakmaya bayılırdı. Ee ona boşuna Bidon Denz demiyorlardı! Kendisine aynı şekilde veda etmek güzel bir jest olur bence. Neyse ki Binliman'da bidonla prometyum bulmak bayağı kolay."
languages.original_text: "The crematorium is a bit wrecked now, heh heh. But who needs a crematorium? Denz loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned — they didn't call him Jerrycan Denz for nothing! I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Krematoryum şu an biraz harap hâlde, heh heh. Fakat krematoryuma kimin ihtiyacı var ki? Denz, düşmanlarını {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometyum{/g}a bulayıp yakmaya bayılırdı. Ona boşuna Bidon Denz demiyorlardı! Ona da aynı şekilde veda etmek güzel bir jest olur bence. Neyse ki Binliman'da bir bidon prometyum bulmak oldukça kolay."
